type="border"/><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper></components><resources><labels/><javascript><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="StatusUpdateForRejected" cachelocation="false">var OpportunityModal = skuid.model.getModel('OpportunityList');
var OpportunityRecord = OpportunityModal.getFirstRow();
var oppId = OpportunityRecord.Id;
console.log('oppId: '+oppId);

var status = 'Accounting Rejected';

console.log('status' + status);

var modal1A = skuid.model.getModel('OpportunityList');
console.log('debug ' + modal1A);

modal1A.updateRow(  { Id: oppId }, {Status__c: status});
console.log('Test ==== '+ modal1A.Status__c);
modal1A.save();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RemovedHyperlink" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1],
$ = skuid.$;	
    

// If we're  in read mode, then remove hyperlink 
if (field.mode !== 'edit') 
{
   skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field, value);
    var linkTag = $('a', field.element);
    if(linkTag.length)
    {
        var output = $('<div>');
        output.append(linkTag.html());
    }   
    linkTag.replaceWith(output);
}</jsitem></javascript><css><cssitem location="inline" name="newcss" cachelocation="false">.nx-pagetitle-maintitle{font-size: 42px;}</cssitem></css></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/></styles><pageregioncontents><pageregioncontent uniqueid="__header"><components><skuidheader sticky="true"><components><pagetitle model="oppraggrED" uniqueid="sk-350yX2-339" cssclass=""><actions/><maintitle>SSC Dashboard</maintitle></pagetitle></components><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/><styleitem type="border"/></styles></skuidheader></components></pageregioncontent></pageregioncontents><interactions/></skuidpage>
